summary: This code snippet is iterating through the arguments (arg) using ipairs function, printing each key and value. The first argument (-1 for Lua, 0 for script name) will be matched as #1 arg1. Using ipairs is beneficial in cases where indices are numbers, and it automatically handles table length changes.

details.comment: This code snippet is iterating through the arguments (arg) using ipairs function, printing each key and value. The first argument (-1 for Lua, 0 for script name) will be matched as #1 arg1. Using ipairs is beneficial in cases where indices are numbers, and it automatically handles table length changes.
details.content:
for key ,value in ipairs(arg) do
	print(key)
	print(value)
	--done
	--had better use ipairs
	-- #1 match for arg1
	-- -1 for lua and 0 for script-name 
end
